entries.command_guard: I want you to stand guard.
entries.command_clear_patrol_points: Soldier, never mind those patrol points.
entries.confused: Sir, could you clarify your orders?
entries.start_convo_4: Yes, sir. What word should I listen for?
entries.end_convo: Yes, sir. You can count on me to obey orders.
entries.command_reply_1: I need to instruct you in how I give orders.
entries.start_convo_2: Yes, sir. Which order do you want to clarify?
entries.which_command: Yes, sir. Which order do you want to tell me about?
entries.taming_toofar: You are too far away to continue taming.
entries.taming_fail: You fail to tame the creature.
